name: social-channel-integrations
description: This package contain Social Channel Integrations with Salesforce B2C Commerce

scripts.data:common:zip: cd data && bestzip common.zip common/* && shx mv common.zip ../common.zip
scripts.data:tiktok:global:zip: cd data/tiktok && bestzip tiktok_global.zip tiktok_global/* && shx mv tiktok_global.zip ../../tiktok_global.zip
scripts.data:oci:feeds:zip: cd data && bestzip oci_feeds.zip oci_feeds/* && shx mv oci_feeds.zip ../oci_feeds.zip
scripts.data:tiktok:site:zip: cd data/tiktok && bestzip tiktok_site.zip tiktok_site/* && shx mv tiktok_site.zip ../../tiktok_site.zip
scripts.data:google:global:zip: cd data/google && bestzip google_global.zip google_global/* && shx mv google_global.zip ../../google_global.zip
scripts.code:upload:feeds: npm run symlink:dwjson:feeds && cd social_feeds && npm run code:upload:feeds
scripts.code:upload:tiktok:ads: npm run symlink:dwjson:channels && cd social_channels && npm run code:upload:tiktok:ads
scripts.code:upload:tiktok:tracking: npm run symlink:dwjson:channels && cd social_channels && npm run code:upload:tiktok:tracking
scripts.code:upload:social:pixel: npm run symlink:dwjson:channels && cd social_channels && npm run code:upload:social:pixel
scripts.code:upload:tiktok:shop: npm run code:upload:tiktok:ads && npm run symlink:dwjson:checkout && cd social_checkout && npm run code:upload:checkout && cd ../ && npm run code:upload:feeds
scripts.code:upload:oms: npm run symlink:dwjson:checkout && cd social_checkout && npm run code:upload:oms
scripts.code:upload:no_oms: npm run symlink:dwjson:checkout && cd social_checkout && npm run code:upload:no_oms
scripts.code:upload:google: npm run symlink:dwjson:channels && cd social_channels && npm run code:upload:google && cd ../ && npm run code:upload:feeds
